content: a yarn of serendipity pam knighton-haener landyn tahj square regardless of skill level please read through entire pattern before beginning landyn tahj is the sixth square in a series designed as a legacy for my grandchildren landyn has a wicked sense of humor is highly spirited and does not hesitate to voice his opinion he has lots of sharp edges but the biggest heart you will ever know oh and he loves basketball hook used/finished and blocked size 4 5 mm 11 x 11 5 mm 12 x 12 crochet terms us terminology throughout skill level intermediate yarn and colors used ▪ i love this cotton worsted weight 100% cotton  colorway 1 a = stonewash b = periwinkle c = pale denim d = ivory  colorway 2 a = red b = black c = ivory d = pewter stitches used double magic_ring fpsc front post single_crochet dc3tog double_crochet 3 together standing stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet dc4tog double_crochet 4 together invisible join fphdc front post half_double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet st s stitch/stitches double_crochet double_crochet fptr front post treble_crochet space space fpdc front post double_crochet bl back loop chain chain bpdc back post double_crochet fl front loop yo yarn over 2dc-cluster 2 double_crochet cluster single_crochet single_crochet 3dc-cluster 3 double_crochet cluster landyn tahj square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 1 of 10 double magic_ring fpdc wrap yarn over the top and around 2 fingers twice yo insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around post so insert your hook under 2 loops grab working yarn and pull post is in front of hook yo pull up a loop back through 1 loop on hook yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times grab working yarn and go over 2 loops pull working yarn bpdc through loop on hook yo insert hook from back-to-front-to-back around post so video right-handed / left-handed post is in back of hook yo pull up a loop standing stitch yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times start with a slip knot on your hook 2dc-cluster insert your hook into designated st or chain space and finish the yo insert hook into designated st yo pull up a loop yo pull st as normal through 2 loops on hook video right-handed / left-handed yo insert hook into same st yo pull up a loop yo pull invisible join through 2 loops on hook do not join after completing last st of the round yo pull through all loops on hook cut yarn pull yarn tail through st 3dc-cluster insert hook from back-to-front of the 2nd st of the round grab yo insert hook into designated st yo pull up a loop yo pull yarn and gently pull through through 2 loops on hook insert hook from back-to- front and bottom-to-top of yo insert hook in same st yo pull up a loop yo pull through the center of the last st of 2 loops on hook 2 times round grab yarn and gently yo pull through
